    • Method Detail

      • getParent

        TreeNode getParent()
        Gets the parent node. Returns null if this is the tree root.
        Returns:
        the parent of this node

      • connectParent

        void connectParent​(TreeNode parent)
        Set the argument as this node's parent. CAUTION: no consistency checks! this is the tree's job.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent node

      • getChildren

        java.util.Collection<? extends TreeNode> getChildren()
        Gets the children nodes.
        Returns:
        the list of children nodes.

      • connectChild

        Adds a node as a child. CAUTION: no consistency checks! this is the tree's job.
        Parameters:
        child - the node to add

      • connectChildren

        default void connectChildren​(TreeNode... children)
        Adds a set of nodes as children
        Parameters:

      • nChildren

        int nChildren()
        Gets the number of children of this TreeNode
        Returns:
        the number of child nodes

      • subTree

        default java.util.Collection<? extends TreeNode> subTree()
        Returns:
        the subtree starting at this node (=this node + all its children's children)
